feed.title: Åndrei Makarov - Blog
feed.subtitle: Technical blog posts about software development, DevOps, and technology

entry.title: Recommendations on Collective Practices
entry.summary: Guidelines for creating safe, respectful, and inclusive spaces in collective activities and public events. Principles of mutual respect, privacy, and zero tolerance for discrimination.

entry.title: Collective Awareness and the Era of Automated Production
entry.summary: Exploring collective awareness in software development, automation with background agents, and the shift from individual to collective responsibility in the age of AI-assisted coding.

entry.title: LLMs as Probabilistic Medium: Between Imitation and Deviation
entry.summary: Exploring Large Language Models as probabilistic mediums rather than intelligence, examining the tension between fluency and meaning, and the essential role of human initiation and deviation.

entry.title: ActiveRecord Model Versioning: A Proposal for activeversion
entry.summary: Exploring a new approach to ActiveRecord versioning with proper schema design, avoiding JSON/YAML storage, and supporting extensibility for i18n, auditing, and draft management.

entry.title: Building Extensible Slack Bots with Grape: The grape-slack-bot Framework
entry.summary: How grape-slack-bot provides an extensible framework for building Slack bots with Grape, supporting slash commands, interactive components, events, and views.

entry.title: Unified Error Reporting: Managing Multiple Services with ActionReporter
entry.summary: How ActionReporter solves the problem of managing multiple error reporting services (Sentry, Honeybadger, Rails logger, etc.) with a single unified interface.

entry.title: Solving Grape API Logging: The Missing Piece for Structured Logs
entry.summary: Why existing Grape logging solutions fail to provide complete request logging and structured JSON output, and how grape-rails-logger and activesupport-json_logging solve this problem.

entry.title: Organizing Seeds: From Single File to Structured Directory with SeedBuilder
entry.summary: How SeedBuilder extends ActiveRecord to organize seeds in a directory structure and generate them as migrations, solving the problem of managing seed data in Rails applications.

entry.title: Schema and Data Migrations: Why They Should Be Separate
entry.summary: Why schema migrations and data migrations are fundamentally different and should be managed separately, with best practices for implementing data migrations in Rails.

entry.title: iOS App Signing and Certificates Management in CI Environment
entry.summary: A detailed guide on setting up and managing iOS app signing in continuous integration environments, including best practices and common pitfalls.

entry.title: The Force Push Debate: When to Rewrite VCS History
entry.summary: A comprehensive guide to understanding Git force pushing, its risks, and when it's appropriate to use. Learn about force-with-lease, best practices, and team communication strategies.

entry.title: Troubleshooting Version Managers on macOS (Apple Silicon & Intel)
entry.summary: A comprehensive guide to troubleshooting Ruby and Node.js version managers on macOS, covering rbenv, RVM, nodenv, nvm, asdf, and mise. Learn about common issues and solutions for both Apple Silicon and Intel Macs.

entry.title: Trunk-Based Releases: A Practical Guide
entry.summary: A comprehensive guide to trunk-based development and release management, including branching strategies, automation, and feature flag management.

entry.title: Principles of Self-Organization and Collective Action
entry.summary: Exploring principles of self-organization, diversity and inclusion, transparency, and ethical guidelines for effective collective action and group decision-making.

entry.title: Freedom, Consumerism, and the Price of Traces
entry.summary: Exploring the relationship between freedom, consumerism, personal boundaries, and the traces we leave in digital spaces. Reflections on autonomy, career, and the cost of visibility.
